entry.name: even
entry.title: :even Selector
entry.desc: Selects even elements, zero-indexed. See also odd.

longdesc.p: In particular, note that the 0-based indexing means that, counter-intuitively, :even selects the first element, third element, and so on within the matched set.

example.desc: Finds even table rows, matching the first, third and so on (index 0, 2, 4 etc.).
